task.title: Configuring SNMP by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators and messaging administrators can configure SNMP by using the SNMP Service panel in the .

context.p: You can enable or disable SNMP by using the , or by using . For more information about using to configure SNMP, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you configure a SNMP, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Server>Server Control menu.
In the SNMP Service section, review the SNMP enabled state.

choices.choice: To enable SNMP, select the Enable SNMP check box.
To disable SNMP, click the Stop the service link.
To start SNMP, click the Start the service link.
